reviews.sentence: UF Orientation. Our family stayed at the Hampton Inn and Suites downtown Gainesville and we highly recommend this hotel for it is location cleanliness service and room size. We had a room with two queen beds and a sleeper sofa. Very large room. you are in the historical downtown so there are restaurants coffee shops etc. Book early and save. We did a prepaid rate and got a great price. I am also a travel professional and normally stay in 5 star hotels so I am spoiled.

Outstanding Room and Service. Traveling late back to Vero Beach and it was time to get off the road. All other properties were booked up so we tried the Hampton and got the last room. The suite was a real treat. The sleeping area felt cozy just like home. Breakfast was good but the service area was very small and the layout confusing. Might not have been as bad but apparently everyone decided to eat at the same time. Definitely Recommend.

Very impressed. Clean quiet and great friendly staff. Stayed for one night and really liked it. Great area with lots of really nice places to eat around it. Small park across the street. Valet parking 14 a night. Would highly recommend.

Best location. This is a nice hotel in the best location in Gainesville. you are with in walking distance to all of the best restaurants bars and coffee shops Gainesville has to offer. I would definitely stay here again.

Good solid hotel. This Hampton seemed better than most. Great staff and rooms. Comfy beds. Nice street view. Accommodating staff. Nice breakfast room. I was not here long but it was very solid. I had stay here again. Small town feel and everyone seemed to care.

Such a great hotel in the perfect location. ALL of the staff was wonderful from the GM Brad the Assistant Manager Mike and the receptionist that checked me in I believe her name was Taylor. Even the Valet guys were very nice and hospitable. We only stayed one night but really enjoyed everything the hotel had to offer. The room was a wonderful layout and very clean. The location was perfect and we enjoyed the area nightlife as well as the restaurants nearby. My husband is a UF graduate so we plan to be back soon. Thank you for a lovely stay.

Loved this hotel. Awesome hotel. walking distance to all the areas I needed during my trip. Close to great food and music venues. The rolm was spotless and modern. The free breakfast was really good. We did not use the pool but it looks very private and inviting maybe next time. We will definetly be back.
Great hotel located in the heart of Gainesville. Close to everything.

Enjoyable Stay. This was my second time staying at this location. I like the convenience of the location. Enjoy being able to walk to my favorite restaurant Dragon Fly. The pool pool area is small and not private to street and traffic.
Lovely downtown area. Very polite and respectful stafGave me choice of room locationPerfectly clean.

Great location excellent staff but the property is tired and needs updating. The rooms have loud AC units. This property is in a great location and the staff are wonderful. that ’s where the compliments end. The rooms have very loud AC units in them. Some of the rooms have terrible pillows and uncomfortable beds. This place needs a lobby renovation and new mattresses and pillows.

One of the elevators was out of order completely and the other did n’t work very well either. Most people took the stairs. The bathroom sink was clogged almost completely. My daughter tried to come in after 12 and could not get anyone on the buzzer or intercom. We have stayed at this property before and been very happy but will have to rethink another stay.

One of the elevators was out of order completely and the other did n’t work very well either. Most people took the stairs. The bathroom sink was clogged almost completely. My daughter tried to come in after 12 and could not get anyone on the buzzer or intercom. We have stayed at this property before and been very happy but will have to rethink another stay.
Nice but not fancy. The location is hard to beat.
Middle of town fun. Walking distance to good food and night life. Staff was amazing. Parking is challenging had to move our vehicle down the block before 9 am.

Severe lack of cleanliness. The staff was so friendly but when I arrive to my room I noticed it smelled old. Not sure how to describe it. Like not well ventilated or like a dirty carpet. I was given a suite on the ground floor and the bathroom connected to the room was so dirty. The floor had a couple of sticky spots not sure why. and there were hairs stuck there. There was a clump of hair too on the corner next to the wall and bathtub. Clearly an employee had come in to set up the room because the bed was made and the bathroom curtain was arranged but this person did n’t clean at all. The bed had a small hair on it and a small brown stain. Little things. but really did not make me feel comfortable sleeping in it. Ca n’t imagine how dirty the brown carpet would ’ve been considering the state of the bathroom.

Overpriced. Overpriced loud party on the street until about 130 with traffic including motorcycles. Not easy to load unload a few spots with people waiting. Parking is ridiculous. 25 to self park. 2 to valet hum. not very friendly staff. Called the front desk about noise she said yes I walked outside call the police. do not recommend this overpriced Hampton Inn.

Overpriced. Overpriced loud party on the street until about 130 with traffic including motorcycles. Not easy to load unload a few spots with people waiting. Parking is ridiculous. 25 to self park. 2 to valet hum. not very friendly staff. Called the front desk about noise she said yes I walked outside call the police. do not recommend this overpriced Hampton Inn.
Typical hampton. Nice location to walk to restaurants. No hotel parking. 22 to park at a Hampton is ridiculous.

Not happy. When we travel we always try to stay in Hampton Inn usually very consistent however the room was ok not the best mattress but ok the breakfast was very inadequate coffee was out no yogurt and a not very pleasant worker. They do n’t tell you valet is 20 and to park in garage 25. Cute town but would not stay here again.
